course_title: Special Topics: Music: New Music & Choreo Lab
class_notes:
(Same as DANC 385-1)
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)
This course will introduce students to the collaborative possibilities between music/sound creators and dance creators. Students will be exposed to diverse creative methods and approaches, experimenting with the interplay between sound and movement, offering opportunities to enhance communication skills and further develop and elucidate their artistic voice. This course will be open to music and dance students. Prior experience with dance composition and improvisation preferred for DANC 385. Prior experience with music composition, performance, and improvisation is preferred for MUS 370.


To request a permission number for DANC 385, email annalee.traylor@emory.edu and describe your experience with choreography and improvisation (including courses taken). To request a permission number for MUS 370, email theodosia.theodosiou.roussos@emory.edu and describe your experience with music composition, performance, and improvisation, including courses taken.
